channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.45 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.45

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed

item.title: Version 1.108.47 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.47

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix test about timezone failing in safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: has correct placeholder
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/thirdparty: bump RequireJS to 2.3.7
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: fixed weekday announcement in multi-month setup

item.title: Version 1.108.43 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.43

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC: Include AdaptationFilterBar triggerSearch before invalidation

item.title: Version 1.108.44 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.44

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done

item.title: Version 1.108.46 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.46

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change

item.title: Version 1.120.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.36

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown

item.title: Version 1.120.38 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.38

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: add a view settings dialog items active announcement
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataTreeBinding: $count requests must not contain $expand or $select

item.title: Version 1.120.39 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.39

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header repositioning in both directions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Add the browser event information to the UI5 event
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.p13n: integrate missing screen reader announcement for table filtering in SAP UI5 1.120
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix test about timezone failing in safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: has correct placeholder
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Prevent duplicate shortcut announcements in screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/thirdparty: bump RequireJS to 2.3.7
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: SemanticFormElement: _updateDisplayText does no longer fail without available _displayField
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction

item.title: Version 1.120.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.33

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: load flex before usage
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix AnchorBar accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Fix fast navigation

item.title: Version 1.120.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: get appointment domref correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxpa.ObjectPageSubSection: Improved key handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior

item.title: Version 1.120.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat.js: support rounding of numbers given as string
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/History: avoid creating history entry when same hash is applied
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.PaneContainer: fix invalidation of nested panes

item.title: Version 1.120.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup

item.title: Version 1.136.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.7

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: first token is now not truncated when not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image not visible, when initials are incorrect
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Invisible message is announced correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of tiles not scrolling left or right when buttons are pressed on the slideTile control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: correct CSS variable references
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Cache failed requests to avoid retry attempts
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Invalid aria-labelledBy fixed

item.title: Version 1.136.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.9

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Fix Korean text display within OverflowToolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Focus issue prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Add the browser event information to the UI5 event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Remove custom shadow overwriting
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Set shadow style according to the "showArrow" property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix test about timezone failing in safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Correct dropdown width when wrapItemsText enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Prevent duplicate shortcut announcements in screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: ComponentContainer: always propagate propagation listeners
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/thirdparty: bump RequireJS to 2.3.7
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: SemanticFormElement: _updateDisplayText does no longer fail without available _displayField
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Month: removed redundant "selected" announce
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: fix wrapping titles
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix wrong positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: prevent infinite rerendering loop

item.title: Version 1.136.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.10

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header repositioning in both directions
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Fixed box-shadow parameter
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/security/sanitizeHTML: Add support for modern CSS display values
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: if ComboBox-Like wrong accessibility info
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix wrong title in AnchorBar

item.title: Version 1.136.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Mdc.FieldBase: Mark keydown event on escape-induced valuehelp close
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Action visualization issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix cloning of "actions"

item.title: Version 1.136.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.3

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default

item.title: Version 1.136.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.4

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: handle shadow DOM as opener
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if measure part is integer, set decimals to '0'
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.5

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add polyfill for Promise.withResolvers
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Derive dist version from preloaded CSS URL
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: handle shadow DOM as opener
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if measure part is integer, set decimals to '0'
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Creation of duplicate SAC widgets is now prevented
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.6

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitApp: busy indicator layer is now also over the master container
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateFormat: Sanitizing a pattern when creating a regex
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/History: avoid creating history entry when same hash is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/LocaleData: getAllCurrencyDigits ignores CLDR in case of custom currencies with DEFAULT
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField not working after upgrading to 1.136.1

item.title: Version 1.136.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.8

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Message positions logic is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataTreeBinding: $count requests must not contain $expand or $select
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: SortFlex: Take sortOrder into account for affectedControl during condensing

item.title: Version 1.136.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.11

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Remove redundant announcements from sort and group list items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: exclude disabled controls from Toolbar navigation

item.title: Version 1.138.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.138.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: fix headerContentLabel upon snap/unsnap
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: endContent documentation is now updated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MenuItem: Add aria-expanded attribute
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: does not work with negative numbers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: text is displayed with small letter
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu auto-closing in some cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: make binding higher prio
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now replaced the instanceof check for promises sent to itemValidationHandler with thenable check to handle the pollyfilled promises in UploadSetwithTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Aligned English translation texts
    • Type: FIX, Description: QueryPanel: move item looses focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: Illustration Explorer: Fix deprecated illustrations handling and integration tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed rowHeaderPress event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Update reset announce message for the screen reader
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove overriden setter for property multipleAppointmentsSelection since the functionality was moved in onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotofictionListGroup: Press is fired on enter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Default button has correct hover color
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: property multipleAppointmentsSelection is not working when set in XML view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning when only oordinates are provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Font rendering issue in Safari is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Typo fixed jsdoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Reset action announcement added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the decorative property of avatar to true for action tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct color in info toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: CSS classes are propagated to the submenus
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: MenuWrapper does not throw JS error when trying to close submenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: prevent Firefox warning by avoiding getElementById with empty ID
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: prevent focus loss on popover close and reopen
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarRightItems: fix unstable tests
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: WebComponents - make base classes non-experimental
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Remove 3rdparty that is no longer used in SAPUI5 code
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: src/sap.ui.core/src/sap/ui/core/.library: Update URL of datajs to correct one
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Allow module github links to OpenUI5 modules
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: APIREF Module link fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Support for text/plain content type in data requests is now added
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Changing a filter value now fires stateChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Field, FilterField: render Select for fixed value lists
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: DynamicDateRange wrong Operator used
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable update selection on opening if conditions not changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: aria-label not assigned to Tokenizer
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: show more-indicator on focus to other field
  • Library: sap.ui.unified

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.integration.widgets.CardFacade#getParameters] Use <code>getCombinedParameters()</code> instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.integration.widgets.CardFacade#setVisible] Use <code>hide()</code> to hide a card opened by <code>showCard()</code>. The card facade does not provide methods for showing or hiding the main card itself.
